SALESFORCE HELP
DOCS
VISUALFORCE B2B COMMERCE RELEASE NOTES AND UPGRADE GUIDE
Provide a Native Language Experience for French and German Admins

For admin users whose Salesforce user language is set to French or German, B2B Commerce for Visualforce now provides a localized experience. CC Admin labels, menus, and configuration settings are now available in both languages by default.

Where: This change applies to B2B Commerce for Visualforce Spring ’20 (version 4.12) in Lightning Experience and Salesforce Classic in Enterprise, Performance, Unlimited, and Developer editions.

How: For users whose Language setting is French and German, the translatable items automatically display in the correct language automatically.

For other languages you want to support, use Translation Workbench to provide your own translations.

title: Native Language Experience for Admins
